home.title: 24h of Le Mans, take the start of the greatest car event in France

tondeuse.p1: Welcome to the 24 Hours of Le Mans, the mythical endurance race! Every year since 1923, the best drivers have competed for 24 hours on a unique circuit combining the Bugatti track and public roads. Speed, strategy and performance await you!
tondeuse.h2: A unique circuit in the Sarthe
tondeuse.p2: Whether you are passionate or curious, the 24 Hours of Le Mans is one of the three most prestigious races with Monaco and Indianapolis. Experience the passion of the fans, the speed and strategy of the cars in action.

numbers.title: Some numbers
numbers.p1: Record attendance for the centenary of the 24 Hours of Le Mans 2023! Join hundreds of thousands of enthusiasts and experience the unique atmosphere of this legendary race. Don't miss the next event and be part of history!

thanks.title: And a big thank you
thanks.p: Thank you to all the enthusiasts who came to celebrate the 24 Hours of Le Mans! Your presence and your enthusiasm make this event an unforgettable experience. We look forward to seeing you again to experience the thrill together at each new edition!

home.services: Discover our ticket offers, to guarantee your place at this emblematic event. Whether you are passionate about motorsport or simply curious to live a unique experience, our tickets will give you access to the best seats and services to fully enjoy the 24 Hours of Le Mans.

prestataires.name: Providers
prestataires.discover: Discover our providers, who offer a wide range of services to enrich your experience. Each of them is delighted to share their know-how and contribute to making your event an unforgettable moment.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.text: Find all the information about the event thanks to our interactive map. Easily explore the places, services and points of interest for an optimal experience on site.

footer.developpeurs: Cédric COLIN - Marvyn LEVIN - Leslie MERAT - Anna GAIFFE - Sugdenaz EKICI

rules.title: Rules for participating in the draw
rules.one: The participant must be of legal age to participate.
rules.three: The information provided must be accurate and verifiable.
rules.four: Participation in the draw is open until June 25, 2025.
rules.five: The winners will be notified by email on June 26, 2025.
